aside.is_not_in_census: You are not in the census
aside.overwrite_votes_left_one: You can correct your vote only once.
aside.overwrite_votes_left_other: You can correct your vote up to {{ count }} times.
aside.verify_vote_on_explorer: Verify your vote on the explorer
aside.voting_anonymous_advice:
Please wait while the anonymous magic ðŸª„ happens.
This can take up to several minutes; don't close the window.

banner.subtitle: Use wallet addresses, vote with an ERC20 token or with NFTs!
banner.title: Voting for DAOs & Web3 communities

banner_voting_types.anonymous_description: We ensure that votes remain unlinked to voter identities by using advanced zkSNARKs technology.
banner_voting_types.flexible_description: Our platform is built on top of the Vocdoni Protocol, ensuring secure, flexible, censorship-resistant and universally verifiable digital voting.
banner_voting_types.token_description: Organizers can create votes using ERC20 tokens, NFTs, POAPs, wallet addresses, and custom data. Stay tuned for advanced voting strategies.

actions.cancel: Cancel the process immediately, not allowing new votes and not counting any results (caution: it cannot be reverted)
actions.continue: Resume the process immediately, in case it has been paused
actions.end: End the process immediately, preventing new votes to be submitted, and shows the voting results (caution: it cannot be reverted)
actions.error_title: There was some error while executing the transaction
actions.pause: Pause the voting process temporarily, until resumed manually. While the process is paused, voters cannot submit votes.

cc.empty: Apparently this process has no questions

errors.wrong_data_description: The specified data is not correct

results.secret_until_the_end: Secret until the end. The results will be available when the process ends on {{ endDate }}
results.title: Results for "{{ title }}"

spreadsheet.anon_sik_helper: This ensures the vote to be anonymous
spreadsheet.anon_sik_label: Define a password for your vote

validation.min_length: This field must be at least {{ min }} characters long

vote.voted_description: To verify your vote, you can use this unique identifier: {{ id }}

census.chain_required: You need to select a network
census.description: Choose how to authenticate and verify voters. At this moment, the methods available to create censuses are: custom data, token based and wallet addresses.
census.title: Census
census.token_description: Configure the census by choosing a token from any available network. You can request a token here.
census.token_required: You need to select a token

claim.loading_description: Please wait while tokens are being claimed

cost_preview.not_enough_tokens: You don't have enough tokens to create this process.
cost_preview.subtitle: Your voting process

error.invalid_cell_data: Some rows do not contain correct addresses: {{rows,list(style:short)}}
error.invalid_row_length: Correct document lines {{rows,list(style: short)}} and load it again
error.invalid_weight_type: Expecting weight in first column at lines {{rows,list(style:short)}}, but found unexpected data
error.not_found: Sorry, the page you are looking for was not found

error_text: Sorry, the page you were looking for was not found

faucet.description: Tokens are necessary for specific actions like creating an election or changing its status. Token requirements vary based on census size, election duration, and other parameters.

general_information.description: You can receive up to {{ amount }} tokens per claim, with one claim permitted every {{ waitHours }} hours.
general_information.description2: Need more for a development project that uses the Vocdoni Protocol? Reach out to us at info(at)vocdoni.io.
general_information.title: General Information

faucet.package_success: Congratulations! Here is your Faucet Package:
faucet.recipient_address: Enter the recipient address you'd like to receive tokens on.
faucet.request_description: Sign in with a social account (to prevent faucet misuse) if you want to request more Vocdoni tokens. We respect your privacy and only request read access.
faucet.title: Vocdoni Tokens Faucet

account_create.description_helper: A brief description of your organization
account_create.description_placeholder: Provide a brief description of your organization (optional)

error.min_address: Please, provide at least one address
error.recipient_address_invalid: Specified address does not seem to be valid

anonymous.description: This setting ensures that votes remain unlinked to voter identities by utilizing advanced zkSNARKs technology on the Vocdoni Protocol.
anonymous.title: Anonymous

overwrite.description: This setting allow voters to revise their vote a single time if needed, providing flexibility and protection against vote coercion.
overwrite.title: Vote overwrite

secret.description: This setting ensures that the votes are encrypted until the end, so the results are only visible and available after the voting process has officially ended.
secret.title: Results at the end

calendar.end_date_description: This voting will start at {{ date.begin, format }} and end at {{ date.end, format }}, lasting approx. {{ date, duration }}
calendar.start_date_description: Specify when the voting process will be open to receive votes. Select "Now" to activate immediately upon publishing.
calendar.title: Voting schedule

census.max_census_resum: You have a pool of {{ uniTokenHolders }} {{ symbol }} potential voters. To reduce the cost of the voting process, you can opt to limit the total number of participants in the voting process. This will not affect specific voters; it will simply reduce the number of holders who can cast their votes.
census.spreadsheet_description: Utilize information such as usernames, passwords, or voter personal details for authentication through a form.
census.token_base_description: Use ERC20, NFTs and POAPs from different EVM networks to create a census of eligible holders.
census.wallet_address_description: Create a census of eligible voters providing a list of wallet addresses.

confirm.census_preview_is_shortened: (preview list is limited to {{ limit }} results)
confirm.census_total_people: {{ count }} people will be elegible for voting in this election
confirm.census_total_people_one: A single person will be elegible for voting in this process
confirm.census_total_people_other: {{ count }} people will be elegible for voting in this process
confirm.confirmation_terms_and_conditions: I agree to the <customLink>Terms and Conditions</customLink>
confirm.confirmation_valid_info: I confirm that all information provided is accurate
confirm.cost_description: Here's the pricing breakdown for your voting process, determined by parameters such as the census size and election duration.
confirm.description: On this page, you can verify and edit your information if needed. Additionally, you can review the voting process cost and buy more credits if necessary.
confirm.title: Preview

process_create.confirm_spreadsheet_removal: Are you sure? Take in mind that the uploaded file will be removed

meta.description: Give your voting process a name and description to inform your voters about its purpose.
meta.description_helper: A brief description of your voting process
meta.description_placeholder: Provide more details about your voting process.
meta.title: Set up your voting process
meta.title_placeholder: Enter the title for your voting process.

question.delete_option: Delete option number {{ option }} in question {{ question }}
question.description: Enter each question along with the possible choices for your voters. Remember, you're free to include numerous questions, each with distinct options.
question.description_placeholder: Write here a description of the question (optional)
question.title: Add Questions

spreadsheet.download_template_description: Download the original template to complete your voter list

preview.description: Members must complete this form to access the voting
preview.title: Form preview
preview.upload_new_list: Upload a new list of voters

requirements.list_one: The first row will be used as the name of the fields that voters will need to fill out.
requirements.list_two: Fields do not distinguish between uppercase and lowercase letters, white spaces will be ignored, and diacritics will be transformed into simple letters.
requirements.list_three: If 'Weighted Vote' is selected, the first column must be an integer indicating the voter's vote weight.
requirements.title: Requirements

process_create.success_description: Redirecting you to the voting process page...

web3.your_wallet_is_added: Your wallet address was automatically added into the census. You can remove it if you want.

get_voc_tokens.authentification_method_helper: You can claim {{ faucetAmount }} tokens from the faucet once every {{ waitHours }} hours.
get_voc_tokens.description: To add more tokens you must sign in with a social account (to prevent missuse of the faucet).We only request read access.
get_voc_tokens.title: Get VOC Tokens

new_organization.description1: Set up your organization for free and start creating voting processes to engage with your community.
new_organization.description2: As a welcome gift, you'll get 50 tokens to begin creating votes on our platform & the chance to claim tokens for free in the faucet!
new_organization.footer: Vocdoni is a secure, privacy-friendly & open-source public voting protocol.
new_organization.name: Organization name
new_organization.title: Create your organization

elections_list_empty.alt: Image illustrating that the organization is empty
elections_list_empty.description: As an organizer, you have the capability to design tailored voting processes for your community. These procedures provide extensive flexibility, allowing options such as a census where voters authenticate using custom data (such as username, password, and birthday), a token-based system enabling all tokenholders to participate, or a whitelist that uses wallet addresses for eligibility.
elections_list_empty.footer: Learn more about creating voting processes <customLink>in this guide</customLink>.
elections_list_empty.not_owner: This organization has no voting processes yet
elections_list_empty.title: Create your first voting process

process.is_invalid: This process has wrong data, thus making it invalid
process.share_caption: I've just cast my vote in {{ title }}!!

confirm.description: Before casting your vote review that everything is correct.
confirm.question: Question {{ number }}: {{ answer }}

status.paused_description: Voting is not possible right now

success_modal.text: We've securely processed and stored your vote on our Blockchain. Click here to verify your vote.
success_modal.title: Vote submitted!

process_create.creation_steps_description: Sign transaction to create the voting process. Generating the census can take a few minutes, please don't close this window.

uploader.click_or_drag_and_drop: <p1>Upload or drag and drop the voter list here</p1><p2>(Allowed formats: CSV, XLSX, and ODS)</p2>
